label: Issues in Art Education
description: A range of topical issues are explored, which may vary from semester to semester, but may include children's artistic development, visual culture and curriculum, the philosophy of art, and cultural studies. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours.
classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
